players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let us all remain vigilant and work together to uncover the truth behind Alice's sudden demise."

Charlie: "I think we should focus on gathering information about Alice's death and try to figure out who might be responsible. We can't afford to jump to conclusions or accuse anyone without solid evidence."
